content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello Baihu Li, thank you for considering my apartment in Mannheim. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. Can you please provide me with your offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My offer is 350 Euros per month. What is your counter offer?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your offer of 350 Euros per month. While I appreciate your interest, I believe that my apartment is worth more than that. I would be willing to negotiate, but my counteroffer would be 400 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to consider your offer of 400 Euros per month, but I am not sure if I can afford that. Can you please provide me with a breakdown of the costs?

Also, do you have any other apartments available that may be more affordable for me?

I am a student, so I need a reliable and affordable housing option. I also want to be on good terms with my landlord, so I would appreciate if you can provide me with information on the maintenance and repairs of the apartment.

Finally, I would like to know if there are any utilities included in the rental price or if I need to pay them separately. Can you please provide me with that information?

Thank you for your time and consideration.

I am open to discussing further, but I need to know more about the costs and the maintenance of the apartment before I can make a decision.
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Thank you for your counteroffer of 400 Euros per month. I understand that you may have some concerns about the affordability of the apartment. I would be more than happy to provide you with a breakdown of the costs, including maintenance and repairs.

Unfortunately, I do not have any other apartments available at the moment that may be more affordable for you. However, I would recommend exploring other options in the area, such as shared apartments or student housing.

In terms of maintenance and repairs, I would be happy to work with you to ensure that the apartment is in good condition. I would also be available to address any issues that may arise during your tenancy.

Regarding utilities, the rental price includes electricity and water, but not gas or internet. You will be responsible for paying for these separately. However, I can provide you with information on the average costs for these utilities in the area.

I hope this information is helpful in making your decision. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
